name: Meathead's Drop a Letter 6 Trivia Game | Drop a Letter | 10 Questions

questions.text:
To complete this quiz, start with a six letter anagrammed word, and drop a letter for each new set of anagrammed words!  For instance, if you have start and tarts, and you lose a t, you end up with star rats.  Each answer consists of two words total, each anagrams of each other.  Get it?  Good!  Now you try!

One who copies outlines of depressions on the moon.

questions.explanation:
caret react & react caret.

	^ is a caret, which is a symbol that you put in to show that you want to insert something somewhere.

ar Ra & Ra ar.

	Argon, or ar.

questions.text:
Now start adding letters!
